meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a blastula.
meanings.sent1: The blastular stage is when the cells start to form a hollow ball.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the blastular structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The blastular appearance of the cake made it look like a mini science project.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a blastular explosion of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The blastular nature of the bubbles in the soda was fascinating to watch.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or resembling a blastula.
meanings.sent1: The blastular cells were carefully examined for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a painting with blastular patterns inspired by nature.
meanings.sent3: The blastular design on the dress made it stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: The music had a blastular rhythm that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The blastular texture of the fabric felt smooth and delicate to the touch.
